thread.title: YUCAIPA: Crafton Hills College to host festival
thread.title_full: YUCAIPA: Crafton Hills College to host festival - Press Enterprise

author: The Press-Enterprise
title: YUCAIPA: Crafton Hills College to host festival
text:
STAFF REPORT
Published: Oct. 2, 2015 Updated: 5:49 p.m. YUCAIPA: Crafton Hills College to host festival Print Photo Share Pin It More Galleries ADVERTISEMENT The Herbivore Festival, a celebration of plant-based living, is Sunday, Oct. 4 at Crafton Hills College. NICK AGRO, , NICK AGRO, FILE PHOTO Related article » Crafton Hills College will host the Herbivore Festival, a celebration of plant-based living, noon to 5 p.m. Sunday. The free event will include lectures, cooking demonstrations, performances, fitness activities and more than 100 vendor booths.
Dr. Hans Diehl, president of the Lifestyle Medicine Institute in Loma Linda, will present the keynote address, “Eat More and Weigh Less: Successful, Rational Weight Management,” at 1 p.m. He will be followed by other speakers on topics that include being vegan, animal rights and the future of agriculture.
Crafton Hills College is at 11711 Sand Canyon Road, Yucaipa.
Information: herbivorefestival.com
Contact the writer: community@pe.com
